Core.Line: Have you found the key?
There. Above you.
A nest with two newborn birds. No sign of parents. A key is sitting next to the nest.
What's on your mind?
I'm thinking how to get the key without disturbing the cubs.
It is very courteous of you.
Cut it out.
Is it normal that the mother is not with them?
Maybe she's just gone for hunting, or never turning back. Missing mom is not the end of the world.
How do think about family?
Some people feed you with or without caring about you. You eat; you grow; you fly away.
I think it's more than that.
Look how the amnesia says. No offense. Anyway you sound like Bookworm, and I don't like it.
I can't help it. Now you mention it, what is between you and Bookworm? Are you two friends?
Family. He said we are brothers. Connected by our hearts.
Then why you hit him?
I... It is my fault. But Bookworm said and believed I can do better. So I am here, to prove Bookworm is correct. I'll never make that terrible mistake again.
Card pokes the key with the long stick. They get the key without disturbing the birds.
He will certainly melt if he hears that.
Yeah. Now we've got this key. I'll wait for you guys at the gate.
